messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] The Shinsengumi
messages.msgSnippet: I learn new things about them every time I look them up.  Best thing is looking at the japanese sites, you ll never know what you find there.  I love the
messages.messageBody:
I learn new things about them every time I look them up. Best thing is looking at the japanese sites, you'll never know what you find there. I love the Shinsengumi too, they got me into the whole Bakumatsu-samurai obsession that I have.

*waves a little makoto flag*


---------------------------------

messages.subject: The Shinsengumi
messages.msgSnippet: Are the greatest histoical group I ve ever seen from an anime series. Since that s where I first came across the Shinsengumi was in Rurouni Kenshin. So I
messages.messageBody:
Are the greatest histoical group I've ever seen from an anime series.
Since that's where I first came across the Shinsengumi was in Rurouni
Kenshin. So I really am happy that it's a ral group I can learn more
about.
